title: Strengthening Practical Leadership Competencies: Project-Based Mobile Learning Content Quality Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic math knowledge and experience with mobile devices
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate five core quality elements of mobile math content: readability, interactivity, accessibility, usefulness, and visual effectiveness.
Learners can derive quality improvement strategies in real-world mobile learning scenarios using project-based collaboration tools.
Learners can analyze content quality by applying a mixed-methods research approach (expert interviews + learner surveys).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
